paper_abstract: This paper considers an intro-molecular version of template-guided recombination (TGR), which has been studied in recent papers as an inter-molecular operation. We demonstrate that the intro-molecular TGR operations are distinct from previous intramolecular models for ciliate gene assembly, including the ld and hi operations. We examine the language-theoretic properties of intro-molecular TGR, including closure properties and solutions to language equations.
